name: Space Drive In
description:
What is Space Drive In?

In Space Drive In you need to prepare food and drinks for your customer in your tiny little space ship. But watch out if you are moving in specific directions you could trigger chaotic special events.

Why is Space Drive In?

The idea and development were part of Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. The theme of this jam was "Let there be chaos" and here we are. The goal was clear - seven days to create a chaotic game.

Space Drive In tries to bring some of this chaos in an already stressful job as a chef at a space ship.

How is Space Drive In?

To play Space Drive In you just need to download and unzip the file and start the 'Space Drive In.exe'. The controls are pretty basic. You can move your character with WASD, keyarrows or your controller. To interact with the machines you need to press the interaction button (E).  

There are four different recipes and several machines. Here are some tips:

  • The freezer can be used from two sides. One gives you ice the other one gives you frozen fries
  • To put some ketchup on your fries you need to walk over the red field with some fries in your hand
  • in the upper left corner and the lower right are two teleporter. But watch out you can trigger a special event which deactivates the teleporters

Who is Space Drive In?

The core development are six guys. So part of our crew are:

  • Richard Schubert (Code)
  • Erik Maria Hasenknopf (Code)
  • Max Putz (Art)
  • Rawalue (Music)
  • Mimas (Game Design)
  • Samu Goetz (Sound)
